text: Muzaffar Ali is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Comilla-8. ==Career== Ali was elected to parliament from Comilla-8 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. He founded Muzaffar Ali Foundation and Muzaffar Ali High School and College. ==Death== Ali died on 29 November 1998 following cardiac failure. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:1998 deaths Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Muzaffar Ali (politician)
